Jack (Eddie Murphy) is a manager of a literary agency that has in its insincerity your primary weapon, however, it annoys both his assistant Aaron (Clark Duke). Their attitudes threaten his marriage to Caroline (Kerry Washington) who wants her husband to spend more time with family. Jack desperately looking for a guru named Dr. Sinja (Cliff Curtis). In this section, Jack suffers karmic repercussions and is hit with magic by Dr. Sinja that sheds a leaf for each word Jack speaks. Now Jack discovers he has only a thousand more words before dying.
